description:
The chromoting client logs a session-close that was
initiated by the client itself.

BUG=106208

Committed: http://src.chromium.org/viewvc/chrome?view=rev&revision=112819

messages.text:
lgtm with one comment.

http://codereview.chromium.org/8772065/diff/1/remoting/webapp/me2mom/client_session.js
File remoting/webapp/me2mom/client_session.js (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/8772065/diff/1/remoting/webapp/me2mom/client_session.js#newcode207
remoting/webapp/me2mom/client_session.js:207: remoting.ClientSession.ConnectionError.NONE);
Please add a comment explaining that we won't get a state change so we log it explicitly.

FYI

http://codereview.chromium.org/8772065/diff/1/remoting/webapp/me2mom/client_session.js
File remoting/webapp/me2mom/client_session.js (right):

http://codereview.chromium.org/8772065/diff/1/remoting/webapp/me2mom/client_session.js#newcode207
remoting/webapp/me2mom/client_session.js:207: remoting.ClientSession.ConnectionError.NONE);
On 2011/12/02 23:48:26, Jamie wrote:
> Please add a comment explaining that we won't get a state change so we log it
> explicitly.

Done.

subject: The chromoting client logs a session-close initiated by the client itself.
